Screwdriver CD Commands
=======================

[![Screwdriver CD badge][Screwdriver CD badge]][Screwdriver CD URL]
[![Apache License badge]][Apache License url]
[![GitHub Workflow Status][GitHub Workflow Status badge]][GitHub Workflow Status url]

A set of [Screwdriver CD commands]. It uses the [Screwdriver sd-cmd] to assist with command validation, publishing, and
tagging.

The following commands are offered (links point to the logically equivalent installation instructions):

> [!IMPORTANT]
> Unless explicitly stated, these commands assumes **Ubuntu** OS runtime

- [Installing HashiCorp Packer](https://qubitpi.github.io/hashicorp-packer/packer/install#Linux)
- [Installing HashiCorp Terraform](https://qubitpi.github.io/hashicorp-terraform/terraform/install#Linux)
- Installing JDK (17)
- Installing Maven
- [Installing Node and NPM](https://deb.nodesource.com/) _on all platforms_
- Installing Python (3.10)

All command tag the latest versions with the `latest` tag.
